column5: I recently wrote a feature on the Sutton River which is now appearing in the January edition of OOD. Combined with that I pieced together a short video for the magazine and it's now live, check it out! Best brook trout fishing in the world.
Well I got something to watch when I get off work.
Thanks Mike for providing us some video to go along with your writeup in OOD .
That's my kind of fishing , backwoods at its best . Mean meat eating brookies , nice
Very nice Mike ! Someday when I'm ready financially , I will contact you for one of these trips Nice to see that the outdoor writing is working out for you. A lot of hard work I'm sure

I`ve always thought that a char only trip wouldn`t be my cup of tea, but the Sutton looks like a unique Ontario gem that should be on the bucket list  very cool Mike, hopefully the magazine is in my mailbox Monday
On the bucket list for sure!
